data.title: Andy Williams, singer of Moon River, dies aged 84 after battle with cancer
data.meta_description: Singer Andy Williams, famous for romantic hits such as Moon River has died, his publicist announced today. Williams’ publicist Paul Shefrin said that the singer had died at home in...
data.text:
Singer

Andy Williams, famous for romantic hits such as Moon River has died, his publicist announced today.

Williams’ publicist Paul Shefrin said that the singer had died at home in Missouri on Tuesday night after losing his year-long battle with cancer.The singer had been diagnosed with cancer last year, but said at the time that he planned to continue his music career.

Among Williams’ many hits are Butterfly, Everything Is Beautiful and The Streak. He is also well known to the current generation for his cover of Music To Watch Girls By, which was used in a recent Fiat car advert.Williams began his career singing with his brothers as a child, and his unique smooth singing voice led to former US president Ronald Reagan labelling him ‘a national treasure’.

He leaves behind a wife and three children.

PICTURES: Andy Williams dies aged 84
